name: White Crow
description:
Find out who you are and find answers to other questions ...

Unexpected events, interesting characters, many notes with useful information await you.

Don't let the darkness consume you!

The level of illumination around the white crow is equal to the level of its HP. Blue lights fall out of black crows - they need to be collected to restore the level of illumination. Darkness always does damage, if you do not stand near the light, you take damage.

Each gift is a unique ability

Combine them to become an even more skillful crow. Defeat the priests to receive a gift. You can get Common, Rare and Legendary gifts!
